snippet: Cam Atkinson scored twice, and Marko Dano and Nick Foligno each had a goal and an assist to lead host Columbus to a 5-2 win over the Rangers on Saturday.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Columbus Blue Jackets beat New York Rangers, 5-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Cam Atkinson scored twice, and Marko Dano and Nick Foligno each had a goal and an assist to lead host Columbus to a 5-2 win over the Rangers on Saturday.

headline.main: Atkinson Leads Blue Jackets Over Rangers; Devils Top Panthers
headline.print_headline: Atkinson Leads Blue Jackets Over Rangers; Devils Top Panthers
